<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eschew Materials](/Feats.aspx?ID=634) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 209 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can use clever workarounds to replicate the arcane essence of certain materials. When Casting a Spell that requires material components, you can provide these material components without a [material component pouch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=33) by drawing intricate replacement sigils in the air. Unlike when providing somatic components, you still must have a hand completely free. This doesn't remove the need for any materials listed in the spell's cost entry.
name: Eschew Materials
